entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
